body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install -j40 --only dependencies dealii


```

### Information on your system

```console
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.15.1
* **Python:** 3.8.3
* **Platform:** linux-opensuse_tumbleweed20200715-broadwell
```

```console
$ cat ~/.spack/linux/packages.yaml 
packages:
   hdf5:
      variants: +fortran +cxx +hl
   petsc:
      variants: +mumps +suite-sparse
   cgns:
      variants: +fortran
   trilinos:
      variants: +rol
   all:
      providers:
         mpi: [mpich]
```

### Additional information


 * [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4941037/spack-build-out.txt)
 * [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4941038/spack-build-env.txt)



### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
